properties.entry: SELECT A.RNUM , A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_TITLE , B.NOTICE_BODY , B.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , B.NOTICE_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.NOTICE_NO , C.NOTICE_TITLE , C.NOTICE_BODY , C.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , E.MEMBER_NAME , C.NOTICE_COUNT , C.CREATED_DATE , C.NOTICE_STATUS FROM TBL_NOTICE C JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON (C.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.NOTICE_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE A ( A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE TBL_NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_COUNT = (SELECT B.NOTICE_COUNT FROM TBL_NOTICE B WHERE B.NOTICE_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = ?

SELECT A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE TBL_NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_TITLE = ? , A.NOTICE_BODY = ? WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE TBL_NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'N' WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_BODY LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT A.RNUM , A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_TITLE , B.NOTICE_BODY , B.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , B.NOTICE_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.NOTICE_NO , C.NOTICE_TITLE , C.NOTICE_BODY , C.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , E.MEMBER_NAME , C.NOTICE_COUNT , C.CREATED_DATE , C.NOTICE_STATUS FROM TBL_NOTICE C JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON (C.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND E.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY C.NOTICE_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_TITLE , B.NOTICE_BODY , B.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , B.NOTICE_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.NOTICE_NO , C.NOTICE_TITLE , C.NOTICE_BODY , C.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , E.MEMBER_NAME , C.NOTICE_COUNT , C.CREATED_DATE , C.NOTICE_STATUS FROM TBL_NOTICE C JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON (C.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY C.NOTICE_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_TITLE , B.NOTICE_BODY , B.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , B.NOTICE_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.NOTICE_NO , C.NOTICE_TITLE , C.NOTICE_BODY , C.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , E.MEMBER_NAME , C.NOTICE_COUNT , C.CREATED_DATE , C.NOTICE_STATUS FROM TBL_NOTICE C JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON (C.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.NOTICE_BODY LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY C.NOTICE_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
